column3: PURPOSE (should be a verb phrase to sound right while installing)
a Wayland Tiling window manager/compositor
xWayland support for sway.
manages user policies.
a Wayland-native minimal terminal emulator with Sixel support (good for rmpc!).
a tool for adjusting screen brightness
is the audio system.
gives pipewire compatibility with PulseAudio programs.
is used to manage audio output and mixing.
a wallpaper tool for Sway.
a lightweight notification daemon.
status bar for KARBS.
an application launcher (Wayland patch).
allows programs like librewolf to access screensharing.
xdg-desktop-portal for screensharing.
Default xdg-desktop-portal for file picking.
is a graphical front-end for polkit.
a local copy of the Arch-wiki without HTML.
a tidier vim with some useful features
is an extensible terminal file manager.
commands to interact with Wayland's clipboard.
preserves data in clipboard when after process that added the data closes.
is a lightweight music daemon.
is a terminal interface for mpd.
is an interactive client for mpd and supports album art.
is the patrician's choice video player.
provides spell checking for librewolf and other programs.
local copy of the Arch-wiki as HTML. Use arch-wiki-lite to search through it.
allows accessing NTFS partitions.
unzips zips.
is a pdf viewer with vim-like bindings.
allows mupdf pdf compatibility in zathura.
can download any YouTube video (or playlist or channel) when given the link.
is the default browser of LARBS which also comes with ad-blocking and other sensible and necessary features by default.
provides syntax highlighting in the shell.
enables the mounting of cell phones.
